text:
Hi Guys, I have an apprentice intern developer who has a question :

“I am working with HubSpot integration where I am using Rest API to connect to the CRM app I am working on. I am able to get the connection working and display some data, but only the default property from HubSpot are displaying. We need help with getting our custom properties to display.

I would assume it something has to do with not having schema, but I don’t know how implement it. Since I am using the API KEY and base URL to get the connection between HubSpot and Retool (CRM).

Links:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/crm-custom-objects>
<https://docs.retool.com/docs/connect-api-resource>

I have troubles with the custom objects from HubSpot, I am trying to do it manually by writng the function.

This is the file I have been working on:
<https://github.com/suon0001/Fibo>

I hope someone can help”
Hello Team , i am trying to migrate the old enpoints to new crm version endpoints , but for subscription email part i couldnt find state opt in update in new version crm
could you please help me
Retool as a CRM, NICE!

To get more properties to populate with an api call you need to append the `properties` parameter to the end of the call. So like if you want the first name of a contact you would go `<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v4/objects/contacts?properties=firstname>`

hey <@U01QVR44MEY> sorry to jump in. I oversee the Delivery and Success team at Alloy and our client has been disconnected from HubSpot for over a week now - although your recommendation was helpful it did not work. <@U04AN6JRQ20> do you have additional details

<@U01QVR44MEY> I have tried according to your last message for authorize URL, but after that also still facing the same issue. I have attached the error screenshot please take a look into that.  cc <@U04AZN5JN9M>
The scopes are messed up
I would suggest copying the install url from the app settings page here's an example
<@U04AN6JRQ20>
ty <@U01QVR44MEY>

Hi, I’m looking for help with using the API to change a Property’s access to view only. I’m using the HubSpot PHP API and there is a class for the `modificationMetadata` object but nothing to implement the property
Of course, let me know if you run into anymore issues
If a property was read only how would you put a value in it?
I’m hoping to only change the value through the API as well
You can restrict the property to only be edited by super admins <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/account/restrict-view-edit-access-for-properties>
I’ve got that open at the moment but I’m hoping to do this with the API itself
Yeah, unfortunately that currently isn't possible. Once the functionality comes out of beta, the functionality might come to the api
Oh that’s a shame. Its like its there ready as on a GET request you can get the `PropertyModificationMetadata`, just not set it
Is there a timeline on when this will be available/a way to see things in beta?
hello

i am doing xero api 2 factor authentication from HubSpot workflow custom code.. and i want to hit the user autherization redirect url that can be open a new xero login window and after login, i select the organization and he gave me the access token and refresh token.but i am not able to open the new login window from autherization redirect url in workflow custom code.
Do we have any way/parameter to pass password in URL for password-protected page, so user don’t need to add it manually?

well, you're not supposed to open an external window on a custom coded action in a WF (what will happen when the workflow triggers and you're not into that workflow to see the window opening?), so you should generate those tokens externally and add those to the WF as secrets
my secret token expire every 30 minutes so there is necessary to call the api in the wf
i did not generate this token every time manually
i want to do this with api url but still not able to do this
I honestly don't have a great idea
Hello! In order to create CRM cards and timeline events for objects within my org (and just my org), do I need to create a public app?
Yes, for timeline event you need a 'public' app. This app won't be listed though and you can just use it for your hub
Thank you!
thanks!
of course, let me know if you run into an issue with setup
I'm not super thrilled about setting up oauth for use in our golang backend  :sweat_smile:
I can't really help you there I use Node for everything and they have a really nice Node quickstart
haha i know :slightly_smiling_face: go developers are used to this situation
And why exactly do you use go? do you just like it more than node?
it's the language the founders at my early startup were most familiar with (IMO an excellent reason)
Yep, if you're familiar with it why change. Excited to see how it goes

Hello all, I am using HubSpot api client on node.js to access my HubSpot account. I want to query Contacts object with HubSpotClient.crm.contacts.basicApi.getById() but instead of contactId, I want to use email. Based on the documentation, I can query with email by adding "idProperty=email" as query parameter. This works via cURL but I could not figure out how to add the query parameter to the request when I am using the client. Anybody can help?
is it possible to pull "2 levels" from HubSpot? That is "get associations to deals AND those deals' associations to lineitems" (in one query)?
You can do this with graphql

Hi, I’m looking to migrate a large set of properties (~a few hundred) to HubSpot’s Custom Object and noticed there is some sort of schema validation that checks for how properties are named (“internal names”). Has anyone else discovered similar issues or know what the naming convention should be?

An example of the issue :

Let’s say we’re trying to assign a property “2_property” to a schema (by calling the schema endpoint). We create the property (either through API or web) and the internal_name now becomes “n2_property” and we wouldn’t have known about the auto renaming when we’re preparing our existing parameters and it gives out error for every one of our set of properties when we try to automate our API calls.

It would help to have known if about the internal name renaming ahead before we create all of the relevant properties.
interesting! I'm using node though, so if there's not a direct REST call I'm going to do 1) fetch deals then iterate over 2) fetch lineitems on those
You can definitely do that, do you have cms pro or enterprise?
don't know really, account 25055848
Looks like Enterprise
Does this link open for you? <https://app.HubSpot.com/l/graphiql>
not really :grin: `Your user account does not have access to Graphiql.`
it does work with the regular batch-fetch method, was just curious if it was directly pullable like a relational query :smile:
Yes you can't have a number be the first character just like in a programming language

I haven't tested this so I don't know but you might be able to use the search endpoint to pull in all the association line items for a deal with the properties <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/search>
ah ok yes, I see our custom backend already uses the searchApi, I'll have a look to see if  we can do something similar :+1:

also no spaces allowed :slightly_smiling_face:
something like a plain regex or maybe slugify <https://www.npmjs.com/package/slugify> will speed up your renaming (remapping, actually) in a predictable way

Hi, Had a query w.r.t content search api- <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/content/search-for-content> .I am using this on a HubSpot page to generate urls based on keywords entered by the editor.This is being done by ajax-get and does not use an api key hence i was hoping that i can still use this after 30th but lately i have been seeing an error on my page which tells me that i am using an api-key(which this api does not use).Does anyone know if this will work after 30th or i should migrate to the newer version-<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/cms/site-search.Also> any inputs on how to go about using the new one will be helpful :slightly_smiling_face:

Thanks :slightly_smiling_face:
Hello, I have a question about user management. Is it possible to add or delete users via API?
